WorkItem.ClosedComment: Data issue not program issue. See other issues regarding missing socket bonuses.
WorkItem.Description: The export to sim feature seems to export 32 AP and 10-11 SP short of what unbuffed stats are in game and armory.
WorkItem.Summary: [Enhance] Export to EnhSim stats are off

Comments.Message: Please post your XML file so I can check what you are on about.

If I use the import from armory feature to load my character, then directly export to sim, the AP and SP values in the sim are 32/10 short of what they should be. Dragonas on Lethon if you want to check the armory import, should have 4610 AP, when copied to the GUI it has 4578.
NO. Please post your XML file I need to see what YOU are seeing not what the current code which has changed substantially since the 9th of Nov when 2.2.27 was released, is seeing.

All tests with your gear from the armoury are exporting 4610 AP which is what your armoury shows. I suspect your DATA might have been corrupted and lost its set bonuses. Check your socket bonuses for all your items and see if any of them have "Socket Bonus : None" ie: NOT that you've chosen gems that don't match, there is nothing wrong with that, but have your items simply got no socket bonus??

I suspect your Belt of Dragons hasn't got its +12 AP or you T9 Head or T9 chest hasn't got its +16 AP. ie: something is missing the socket bonuses. This then means the item is being undervalued and missing those bonuses when exported.

Note that this is a DATA issue and not a PROGRAM issue. ie: nothing we can do to fix it. You simply need to right click - edit the item and add in the socket bonus. You can do this per item then export the result to give the right figures in EnhSim.
